t:
Seeing my girlfriend's garden full of a strange white plant and flower, I used Google Lens trying to identify it.



I was surprised to find that it was called Ghost plant, a plant that only grows on dead bodies.
c:
Info: Indian Pipe, also called Ghost plant, is a white parasitic plant that can grow on certain fungi. It doesn't necessarily grow only on dead bodies.



#google #lens #white #plant #girlfriend #garden #ghost #death
